column4: im getting "libstdc++.so.5: cannot open shared object file" ... i tried apt-get on that file but it can't find that package... does anyone know what the name of the package is that will install that for me
you need to install nvidia drivers
try opening a terminal and typing "nvidia-settings"
ok as long as theres a bunch of stuff listed you are good to go
my file has tons of the silly wacom references in it
i had to get back to the backup xorg file to get back in
one more q.   for my tablet to work i haveto do   sudo ln -s /dev/input/wacom /dev/wacom   but that resets every time i reboot... how can i make sure that the link stays
